question: You are studying for a qualification, and you would like some time off work to complete it.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:Ask for some time off to complete a qualification.Suggest what you will do later at work if you have time off.Say how the qualification helps your job or company.
text: I am your employer working in this company for the last 20 years. I would like to present my request in order to avail a certain amount of break from my office job , like around 15 to 20 days, as I have to give my certification exam.

As soon as I resume after giving my qualification exam, I will complete all the backlog tasks assigned to me. Also, some of the tasks will be assigned to my juniors who work for me. If required, will sit back extra hours to finish it off.

As my certification exam is about Project management one, it would be more resourceful in organizing my task since my role is more related to project management. It would help to organize, prioritize and categorize as per the urgency of the project. Furthermore, documentation will be implemented in a standardized and  uniform format which would be helpful for prospective projects on a large scale.
Request you to consider my request as I will be waiting for your earnest approval.

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is a pronoun problem here.
